i can't think

So, we want to take control in makerom 0x1000. We only have 0x50 bytes to do anything (lol ique)

we want to limit the amount of pifrom access we manually have to do.

we can store our custom boot loader in oot's makerom, provided that we patch that shit back up

we could even boot into the main game with it partially corrupted, then repair it in the bootloader

function 801902D8 crash due to null pointer being sent in to a0
ra 80191DF8 

8024A4C0
8024FFD0 table

80190DA0 //initializes table



fun times

80113B70 //audio seq table in oot
